tool.name: Mummerplot

param.name: seq_input
param.label: Plot an ordered set of reference/query sequences?

param.name: layout
param.label: Layout a .delta multiplot in an intelligible fashion

param.name: breaklen
param.label: Break Length
param.help: Highlight alignments with breakpoints further than breaklen nucleotides from the nearest sequence end

param.name: color
param.label: Color plot lines with a percent similarity gradient or turn off all plot color

param.name: filter
param.help: Only display .delta alignments which represent the 'best' hit to any particular spot on either sequence, i.e. a one-to-one mapping of reference and query subsequences

param.name: fat
param.label: Layout sequences using fattest alignment only

param.name: prefix
param.label: File Prefix
param.help: Enter a file prefix or keep the default

param.name: ref_id
param.label: Reference sequence ID on the X-axis

param.name: query_id
param.label: Query sequence ID on the Y-axis

param.name: size
param.label: Set the output size to small, medium or large

param.name: snp
param.label: Highlight SNP locations in each alignment

tool.help: Mummerplot is a perl script that generates gnuplot scripts and data collections for plotting with the gnuplot utility. It can generate 2-d dotplots and 1-d coverage plots for the output of mummer, nucmer, promer or show-tiling. It can also color dotplots with an identity color gradient.
